News Events Undergraduate Programs Graduate Programs Experiential Education in Computer Science (Co-op) Research Members of the SchoolFaculty Limited Term Sessional Instructors Adjunct Faculty Members Staff Student Representatives Academic Planning and Resources Technical Resources for Students Financial Resources for Students Contact Us UWindsor Home School of Computer Science Dr. Jessica Chen Dr. Jessica Chen Associate Professor 519-253-3000 ext. 3713 xjchen@uwindsor.ca Office: L.T. 8100 Education: BSc from Beijing University PhD from Scuola Normale Superiore di Pisa Research Interests: Multimedia (online video streaming) Data analysis and machine learning Formal specification and verification (temporal logics, model checking) Communication protocols Software design and testing Selected Publications: Jessica Chen, Henry Milner, Ion Stoica, Jibin Zhan. Benchmark of Bitrate Adaptation in Video Streaming. ACM Journal of Data and Information Quality, Vol. 13, Issue 4, No. 22, pp 1-24, 2021. Zahaib Akhtar, Anh Minh Le, Yun Seong Nam, Jessica Chen, Ramesh Govindan, Ethan Katz-Bassett, Sanjay G. Rao, Jibin Zhan. Improving Adaptive Video Streaming through Session Classification. ACM Journal of Data and Information Quality, Vol. 11, Issue 4, No. 21, pp 1-29, 2019. Zahaib Akhtar, Yun Seong Nam, Ramesh Govindan, Sanjay G. Rao, Jessica Chen, Ethan Katz-Bassett, Bruno Ribeiro, Jibin Zhan, Hui Zhang. Oboe: auto-tuning video ABR algorithms to network conditions. ACM SIGCOMM 2018, pages 44-58. Xiao Jun Chen, Rocco De Nicola. Algebraic characterizations of trace and decorated trace equivalences over tree-like structures. Theoretical Computer Science 254(1-2): 337-361, Elsevier, 2001. Xiao Jun Chen, Giuseppe De Giacomo. Reasoning about nondeterministic and concurrent actions: a process algebra approach. Artificial Intelligence 107(1): 63-98, Elsevier, 1999.
